import React, { Component } from 'react' import _ from 'lodash' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import connectComponent from '@/connect' import history from '@/utils/history' import WrapComponents from '@/components/wrapper' import { Radio } from '@/components/radio' import { ColoredButtons, TransparentButtons } from '@/components/button' import Stepper from '@/components/stepper' import Loader from '@/components/loader' import { LoaderFlash } from '@/components/loader' // import IosBg from '../../assets/images/ios-bg.jpg' // import WebBg from '../../assets/images/web-bg.jpg' import { getParentDetails } from '@/actions/CreateCampaign/PnCampaign' import { SendCampaign, GetTimeString } from '@/actions/utils' class StepFive extends Component { state = { parentID: '', steps: ['Channel', 'Message', 'Scheduling', 'Segmentation', 'Overview'], sent: false, testSent: false, } componentWillMount = () => { let { params: { parent_id }, } = this.props.match parent_id = parseInt(parent_id, 10) this.setState({ parentID: parent_id, }) getParentDetails(parent_id) } handleInputFields(key, value) { if (!value) { this.setState({ [key]: value, }) } else { this.setState({ [key]: value, }) } } sendCampaign = async () => { const { data } = this.props.CreateCampaign const requests = [] if (_.isArray(data)) { _.forEach(data, part => { requests.push(SendCampaign({ campaignID: part.campaignId || part.campaignId })) }) } await Promise.all(requests) this.setState({ sent: true, }) setTimeout(function() { history.push('/campaign') }, 4000) } sendTestCampaign = async () => { const { data } = this.props.CreateCampaign const requests = [] if (_.isArray(data)) { _.forEach(data, part => { requests.push( SendCampaign({ campaignID: part.campaignId || part.campaignId, triggerToTestUsers: 1, }) ) }) } await Promise.all(requests) this.setState({ testSent: true, }) } render() { const { steps, parentID, sent } = this.state const { CreateCampaign: { data, loading }, } = this.props if (loading) { return } return (
